channel.title: CVE Feed for WebDorado -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WebDorado -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-48320|2023-11-30T16:32:18.302Z -- webdorado -- spidervplayer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebDorado SpiderVPlayer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SpiderVPlayer: from n/a through 1.5.22.

item.title: CVE-2023-46090|2023-10-26T13:20:25.781Z -- webdorado -- wdsocialwidgets
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WebDorado WDSocialWidgets plugin <= 1.0.15 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-46619|2023-11-13T00:43:31.231Z -- webdorado -- wdsocialwidgets
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WebDorado WDSocialWidgets plugin <= 1.0.15 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45632|2023-10-18T13:35:58.871Z -- webdorado -- spidervplayer
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WebDorado SpiderVPlayer plugin <= 1.5.22 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-31123|2024-06-04T17:35:57.678Z -- webdorado -- spiderfaq
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebDorado SpiderFAQ allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects SpiderFAQ: from n/a through 1.3.2.
